welcome: Welcome to the Trans Resource Messaging Service! If you need to talk to someone who understands, text TALK. To find legal resources, text LEGAL. To get inspired, text LOVE.
repeat: I did not understand that. Please text TALK, LEGAL, or LOVE.
talk: Visit https://www.translifeline.org/ to talk to other transgender folks who are trained to provide support and empathy to you.
legal: The Transgender Law Center can get you started at https://transgenderlawcenter.org/.
inspiration: I'm not missing a minute of this. It's the revolution. - Sylvia Rivera
It is revolutionary for any trans person to choose to be seen and visible in a world that tells us we should not exist. - Laverne Cox
Owning who we are is power. Yes. We've got to dare to stand out. - Janet Mock
The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they donâ€™t have any. - Alice Walker
My right to be me is tied with a thousand threads to your right to be you. - Leslie Feinberg
For small creatures such as we, the vastness is bearable only through love. - Carl Sagan
We are not what other people say we are. We are who we know ourselves to be, and we are what are. - Laverne Cox
